item.title: Gratitude Register
item.author: ahmed@offsechq.com (A.Alghali)
item.description:
Everyone is atheist until the plane start falling, I have no clue who said this

The numerous differed stories that act as catalysts for returning to God and thinking about the existence of a grand designer, creator shared by people across the globe is interesting. There are variety of patterns often the most interesting ones are the ones concluded through Epistemic Rationality and not convenience or bias, where there was an evidence that God existed, for them. One pattern is how God existed in everyday life. A good example is the historical belief that the creation of all temples and religions around the world throughout history is an innate, lowkey, subtle need for God.
